name: Blocks 'n Trees [LD46]
description:
Developed for Ludum Dare 46. #LudumDare46

Here is the submission link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/blocks-n-trees

Blocks 'n Trees is a puzzle game where you need to keep the trees alive by dragging blocks with different behaviours onto the trees.

HOW TO PLAY:
Drag the blocks towards any tree and drop it
You have 5 types of blocks
- Water Block - Restores 2 hearts of any tree
- Sun Block - Restores 1 heart of all the trees alive
- Seed Block - Plants a tree in a blank patch
- Heavy Block - Removes a tree
- Random Block - Does any of the first four

You cannot plant and tree if there is a dead tree already. Keep your trees alive!

CONTROLS:
- Mouse Left Click: Drag the blocks around
- Mouse Right Click / Q-E: Rotate camera

Music: https://www.bensound.com
